net.flighttweets.tweets
Class StorageManager

java.lang.Object
  net.flighttweets.tweets.StorageManager

public class StorageManager
extends java.lang.Object

Manager for the storage of the tweets. It implements the singleton pattern, get an instance of the class through the getInstance method. The manager provides the connection to the tables, creating them as needed.
